value.title: Shared & Certified datasets in Power BI
value.excerpt: Let's take a look at the new shared and certified datasets feature in Power BI Desktop and the Power BI service. This opens up a lot of possibilities and helps to reduce data silos.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba
